text: Harris holds slight national lead over Trump, Post-ABC-Ipsos poll finds  —  The result is a notable improvement for Democrats in a contest that a little more than a month ago showed Biden and Trump in a dead heat.  —  Vice President Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over former president Donald Trump …

Facing setbacks, progressives focus on pragmatic goals for a Harris presidency  —  It's not 2020 anymore.  Gone are the skyscraping ambitions of Medicare for All and a Green New Deal.  The left, facing electoral defeats and a political shift, is recalibrating strategy.

‘Keyboard warrior’ from Lincoln jailed for three years for stirring up racial hatred after Southport deaths  —  By Lincs Online Reporter - news@lincsonline.co.uk  —  A ‘keyboard warrior’ who admitted publishing written material online to stir up racial hatred during the recent protests was today (Friday) jailed for three years.
